turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, hoping you can help me order a pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four large gluten-free pizzas. So, just the crust has to be gluten-free. Two of them, extra cheese. So, plain extra cheese. And one of them pepperoni and the other with onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that was 4 large gluten free crust pizza, 2 with extra cheese, 1 with pepperoni, and 1 with onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $65.33 is the total for the order. did you want to order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. And how long until that's ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order for pick up. it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it today. Thank you.
